articles.title: Louisville-Wisconsin preview: Cards and Badgers finally square off in ACC-Big 10 Challenge - Card Chronicle
articles.description: Ten days after it was originally scheduled to be played, we’re finally getting a top 25 showdown in Madison.
articles.content:
